summary: FRONT BRAKE ROTORS WARPED AT 19,000 MILES REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY..ROTORS WARPED AGAIN AT 31,000 MILES AND RESURFACED UNDER WARRANTY..WARPED BEYOND REPAIR AT 46,000 MILES..DEALER AND GM WILL NOT REPLACE AND DOES NOT BELIEVE THIS TO BE A DEFECT. DID NOT HAVE SAME PROBLEM WITH 97 CAMARO.   *NLM
